text: Niscayanga, maryam kumarudu masih (kristu) ye allah!" Ani palike varu vastavanga satyatiraskarulu! Mariyu masih (kristu) ila annadu: "O israyil santati varalara! Na prabhuvu mariyu mi prabhuvaina allah ne aradhincandi. Vastavaniki, itarulanu allah ku bhagasvamuluga cese variki, niscayanga, allah svarganni nisedhincadu. Mariyu vari asrayam narakagniye! Mariyu durmargulaku sahayam cese varu evvaru undaru
